name: Kill Me Save Me
description:
=====Game is still in development.

Please  provide some feedback for improvement on my game

I had make it available for navigating around the levels =====

A and D for left and right.

W for jump.

J for attack.

Story:

Big slime had eaten poisonous mushroom and went bashing around destroying everything it saw.

Keep defeat and revive the big slime to purify it until it recover.
